reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and appreciate its perfect fit and great quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality dress, cute and comfy
items.body: Got the right one the second time and absolutely love it fabric is thick but flowy, the color is great, and itâ€™s comfy I can sit down without it being tight the fit is perfect Read more
items.author: Monica Katt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This dress was a perfect fit. Very sexy. The only thing was the front flap was too long and I hemmed it. I got a lot of compliments at a wedding I went to. Read more
items.author: Deirdre L. Edmond

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Miusol Dress
items.body: This dress is stunning very nice quality and fits a perfect small. Cant wait to wear it. Read more
items.author: Lorraine DeJohn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last minute dress saved the night
items.body: Beautiful dress and fits perfectly Iâ€™m a size 12 and I ordered a L. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress, But the Zipper Ruins It
items.body: The dress itself is beautiful â€” the lace, sequins, and satin look elegant and almost perfect for a special event. The fit is flattering and the style is exactly what I expected. The downside is the zipper. It feels cheap, gets stuck, and I was worried it would break while trying it on. For a dress designed to look classy and high-end, the zipper quality doesnâ€™t match the rest of the garment. The zipper definitely needs improvement. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gown, but a bit confused in the size chart.
items.body: Craftsmanship wise, this dress is perfect. Comfortable soft material, it's nice and heavy so no wind oopsies, there's no loose threads or sequins, it's just overall very well built. It's absolutely beautiful as well. But I do have one gripe. The size chart provided is very confused. I ordered a medium, which listed a 33 inch waist and 28 inch bust. Who's bust is smaller than their waist? I have a 30 inch waist, so I should have ordered the small, but out of concern for the bust being too tight I sized up. I shouldn't have done that. The bust is far, far too big. The waist measurements seem accurate, it does indeed seem to be a 33 inch waist (maybe more since it's supposed to be tight in the waist), so it's definitely roomy for me. But I have a 37 inch bust and it's WAY too big! If I had to guess the bust is closer to somewhere around 40-44 inches. It fits beautifully in the hips and thighs (I have 40 inch hips). It's decently stretchy too so you've got wiggle room. However, it's also kind of ridiculously long. I'm 5'7, I was wearing 4 inch heels when I took the photos, and it's still dragging the ground. It's a gorgeous dress, so I'll likely get it altered to fit better, but I'm disappointed that I have to. They definitely need to fix their size guide. I typically wear a size 8/medium in dresses and this fits more like a 10-12, so definitely size down. In the third photo, I'm holding it tighter in the back so you can see how it would look Read more
items.author: Starr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: I like it and canceled the return, Iâ€™m keeping it Read more
items.author: Reem Mikhail

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but too long
items.body: Beautiful dress but waaaaay too long. Iâ€™d need 4 inch heels ðŸ‘ . Iâ€™m too old for that. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Maxi High Split Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Maxi High Split Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Maroon, A-navy Blue, Royal Blue, Black, Cinnamon Pink, Golden. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
